headline: Changelog
description: Stay up to date with the latest features, improvements, and bug fixes in Clipposaurus.

items.title: Multi-file Upload Support
items.description: You can now upload multiple files at once, making it easier to share entire project folders or collections of documents.

items.title: Custom Expiration Times
items.description: Choose between 15 minutes, 30 minutes, 1 hour, or 6 hours for your content expiration. More flexibility for your sharing needs.

items.title: QR Code Generation
items.description: Automatically generate QR codes for your drops, making it easy to share content with mobile devices.

items.title: Faster Upload Speeds
items.description: Optimized file upload process resulting in 40% faster upload times for large files.

items.title: Better Mobile Experience
items.description: Redesigned mobile interface with improved touch targets and better responsive layouts.

items.title: Enhanced Code Editor
items.description: Added support for 50+ new programming languages and improved syntax highlighting accuracy.

items.title: Fixed Copy Button on iOS
items.description: Resolved issue where the copy button wasn't working correctly on iOS Safari.

items.title: Improved Error Messages
items.description: More descriptive error messages to help users troubleshoot issues quickly.

items.title: Dark Mode
items.description: Added full dark mode support with automatic theme detection based on system preferences.

items.title: Download All Files
items.description: New button to download all files in a drop as a single ZIP archive.

items.title: Syntax Theme Selection
items.description: Choose from 10+ code editor themes for better code readability.

items.title: Improved Loading States
items.description: Added skeleton loaders and better visual feedback during content loading.

items.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
items.description: Added keyboard shortcuts for common actions (Ctrl+V to paste, Ctrl+S to save).

items.title: Better File Preview
items.description: Enhanced file preview for images, PDFs, and common document formats.

items.title: Fixed Text Wrapping
items.description: Long text without spaces now wraps correctly instead of overflowing the container.

items.title: Fixed Magic Words Generation
items.description: Resolved rare issue where magic words could contain similar-looking characters.

items.title: Reduced Bundle Size
items.description: Optimized JavaScript bundle size by 30%, resulting in faster initial page loads.

items.title: Better Error Handling
items.description: Improved error handling for network issues and server errors.

items.title: SEO Improvements
items.description: Added proper meta tags and structured data for better search engine visibility.

items.title: Fixed File Upload Timeout
items.description: Increased timeout for large file uploads to prevent premature failures.

items.title: Fixed Code Language Detection
items.description: Improved accuracy of automatic programming language detection.

items.title: Fixed Memory Leak
items.description: Resolved memory leak issue that occurred when uploading multiple files in succession.

items.title: Secure Content Sharing
items.description: End-to-end encrypted sharing for text, code, and files with automatic deletion after 1 hour.

items.title: Magic Words System
items.description: Easy-to-remember two-word codes for accessing your shared content.

items.title: Code Syntax Highlighting
items.description: Support for 180+ programming languages with automatic language detection.

items.title: File Upload Support
items.description: Upload files up to 100MB with secure encrypted storage.

items.title: No Registration Required
items.description: Share content instantly without creating an account or signing in.

items.title: Cross-Device Sharing
items.description: Share content seamlessly between desktop, mobile, and tablet devices.

items.title: Privacy-First Design
items.description: No tracking, no ads, no personal data collection - just secure sharing.
